38   | double test_d = 2.0;
39   | char   test_s[80];
40   | int    test_i = 20;
41   | int    test_h = 0x15;
42   | int    test_b = FALSE;
43   |

45   | MENU M_shell[] =
46   | {
47   |   { "Directory ", 0, do_dir,     "", NULL, NULL, },
48   |   { "Change dir", 0, change_dir, "", NULL, NULL, },
49   |   { "OS shell  ", 0, OS_shell,   "", NULL, NULL, },
50   |   { "Exit      ", 0, do_exit,    "", NULL, NULL, },
51   |   { NULL }
52   | };
53   | 
54   | MENU M_TEST_EDIT[] =
55   | {
56   |   { "Edit float   ", 5, NULL, "",  &test_f, "%.3f"  ,EDIT_STR },
57   |   { "Edit double  ", 5, NULL, "",  &test_d, "%.6lf" ,EDIT_STR },
58   |   { "Edit string  ", 5, NULL, "",  test_s,  "%s"    ,EDIT_STR },
59   |   { "Edit Integer ", 5, NULL, "",  &test_i, "%d"    ,EDIT_STR },
60   |   { "Edit Hex     ", 5, NULL, "",  &test_h, "%x"    ,EDIT_STR },
61   |   { "Edit Boolean ", 5, NULL, "",  &test_b, "%B"    ,SELECTABLE },
62   |   { NULL }
63   | };
64   | 
65   | MENU M_TEST_HELP[] =
66   | {
67   |   { " Window functions", -1, NULL, "window functions",      NULL, NULL, HELP_ONLY },
68   |   {NULL}
69   | };
70   | 
71   | MENU M_WINDEMO[] =
72   | {
73   |   { "Demo", 0, overlap_demo, "overlap demo", NULL, NULL, NO_FLAGS},
74   |   { NULL }
75   | };
76   | 
77   | MENU_HEAD heads[] =
78   | {
79   |   { "System",  0, 4, M_shell     },
80   |   { "Edit",    0, 5, M_TEST_EDIT },
81   |   { "Help",    0, 7, M_TEST_HELP },
82   |   { "Window_demo", 0, 1, M_WINDEMO },
83   |   { NULL }
84   | };

89   | char error_msg[132];

91   | /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------------
92   |     FUNCTION: overlap_demo()
93   |      PURPOSE: Demo of overlapping windows
94   |  DESCRIPTION: -
95   |      RETURNS: nothing
96   |      HISTORY: 920217 V0.1
97   | --#-func----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
98   | void overlap_demo()
99   | {
100  |   WINDOW *w1;
101  |   WINDOW *w2;
102  |   WINDOW *w3;
103  |   WINDOW *w4;
104  | 
105  |   w1 = wn_open(_SINGLE_LINE,10,10,10,10,
106  |                16*YELLOW+GREEN,16*YELLOW+GREEN);
107  |   wn_printf(w1,"Window 1\n");
108  | 
109  |   getch();
110  |   w2 = wn_open(_DOUBLE_LINE,12,12,10,10,
111  |                16*RED+GREEN,16*RED+GREEN);
112  |   wn_printf(w2,"Window 2\n");
113  | 
114  |   getch();
115  |   w3 = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,14,14,10,10,
116  |                16*BLUE+GREEN,16*BLUE+GREEN);
117  |   wn_printf(w3,"Window 3\n");
118  | 
119  |   getch();
120  |   w4 = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,16,16,10,10,
121  |                16*CYAN+YELLOW,16*CYAN+YELLOW);
122  |   wn_printf(w4,"Window 4\n");
123  | 
124  | 
125  |   wn_printf(w1,"Window 1\n");
126  |   getch();
127  |   wn_printf(w2,"Window 2\n");
128  |   getch();
129  |   wn_printf(w3,"Window 3\n");
130  |   getch();
131  |   wn_printf(w4,"Window 4\n");
132  |   getch();
133  | 
134  |   wn_printf(w4,"Window 4\n");
135  |   getch();
136  |   wn_printf(w3,"Window 3\n");
137  |   getch();
138  |   wn_printf(w2,"Window 2\n");
139  |   getch();
140  |   wn_printf(w1,"Window 1\n");
141  |   getch();
142  | 
143  |   w4 = wn_close(w4);
144  |   getch();
145  |   w3 = wn_close(w3);
146  |   getch();
147  |   w2 = wn_close(w2);
148  |   getch();
149  |   w1 = wn_close(w1);
150  | }
151  | 
152  | /*#+func--------------------------------------------------------------
153  |     FUNCTION: call_zapload()
154  |      PURPOSE: Call the zapload utilitie.
155  |  DESCRIPTION: -
156  |      RETURNS: nothing
157  |      HISTORY: 911211 V0.1 - Initial version
158  | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------*/
159  | void call_zapload(void);
160  | void call_zapload()
161  | {
162  |   char command_str[80];
163  |   WINDOW *w;
164  | 
165  |   /*----------------------------
166  |     Open standard DOS window
167  |   -----------------------------*/
168  |   w = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,
169  |               16*BLACK+WHITE,16*BLACK+WHITE);
170  | 
171  |   sprintf(command_str,"zapload");
172  |   system(command_str);
173  |   puts("\n\nPress any key to continue ...");
174  |   getch();
175  | 
176  |   w = wn_close(w);
177  | }
178  | 
179  | /*#+func--------------------------------------------------------------
180  |     FUNCTION: call_hexconv()
181  |      PURPOSE: Call the HEX converter utilitie.
182  |  DESCRIPTION: -
183  |      RETURNS: nothing
184  |      HISTORY: 911211 V0.1 - Initial version
185  | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------*/
186  | void call_hexconv(void);
187  | void call_hexconv()
188  | {
189  |   char command_str[80];
190  |   WINDOW *w;
191  | 
192  |   /*----------------------------
193  |     Open standard DOS window
194  |   -----------------------------*/
195  |   w = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,
196  |               16*BLACK+WHITE,16*BLACK+WHITE);
197  | 
198  |   sprintf(command_str,"convert");
199  |   system(command_str);
200  |   puts("\n\nPress any key to continue ...");
201  |   getch();
202  | 
203  |   w = wn_close(w);
204  | 
205  | }
206  | 
207  | /*#+func--------------------------------------------------------------
208  |     FUNCTION: call_terminal()
209  |      PURPOSE: Call the specified terminal.
210  |  DESCRIPTION: -
211  |      RETURNS: nothing
212  |      HISTORY: 911217 V0.1 - Initial version
213  | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------*/
214  | void call_terminal(void);
215  | void call_terminal()
216  | {
217  |   char command_str[80];
218  |   WINDOW *w;
219  | 
220  |   /*----------------------------
221  |     Open standard DOS window
222  |   -----------------------------*/
223  |   w = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,
224  |               16*BLACK+WHITE,16*BLACK+WHITE);
225  | 
226  |   sprintf(command_str,"%s","procomm");
227  |   system(command_str);
228  | 
229  |   w = wn_close(w);
230  | 
231  | }
232  | 
233  | /*-------------------------------------------------------------------
234  | |    FUNCTION: do_exit()
235  | |     PURPOSE: Perform exit(0) call from pulldown menu
236  | | DESCRIPTION: -
237  | |     RETURNS: nothing
238  | |     HISTORY: 911107 V0.1 - Initial version
239  | ---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
240  | void do_exit()
241  | {
242  |   exit(0);
243  | }
244  | 
245  | /*-------------------------------------------------------------------
246  | |    FUNCTION: exit_prog()
247  | |     PURPOSE: exit from program
248  | | DESCRIPTION: Perform this function only once:
249  | |              exit from frontend processor,
250  | |              update system files,
251  | |              close window enviroment and
252  | |              call exit().
253  | |     RETURNS: nothing
254  | |     HISTORY: 911124 V0.3
255  | ---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
256  | void exit_prog()
257  | {
258  |    static int done = FALSE;
259  | 
260  |   if (!done)               /* Do this only once */
261  |   {
262  |     wn_exit();          /* Exit from HvA window enviroment          */
263  |     done = TRUE;        /* Set flag (this routine has been executed */
264  |   }
265  | }
266  | 
267  | /*-------------------------------------------------------------------
268  | |    FUNCTION: Intro_screen()
269  | |     PURPOSE: Intro screen with copyright message
270  | | DESCRIPTION: -
271  | |     RETURNS: nothing
272  | |     HISTORY: 911124 V0.1 - Initial version
273  | ---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
274  | void intro_screen(void);
275  | void intro_screen()
276  | {
277  |   static MENU menu[]=
278  |   {
279  |     {"OK",   0, NULL, NULL,        NULL, NULL, EXIT      },
280  |   };
281  | 
282  | #if defined(USE_FORTIFY)
283  |   Fortify_ListAllMemory();
284  |   // Fortify_OutputStatistics();
285  | #endif
286  | 
287  |   wn_dialog(13,40,1,menu,6,
288  |     "       WINDOW TEST        ",
289  |     "                          ",
290  |     "                          ",
291  |     "  (c) H.B.J. van Asselt   ",
292  |     "      12 OCT 1993         ",
293  |     "");
294  | 
295  | #if defined(USE_FORTIFY)
296  |   Fortify_ListAllMemory();
297  |   // Fortify_OutputStatistics();
298  | #endif
299  | }
300  | 
301  | /*-------------------------------------------------------------------
302  | |    FUNCTION: initialize()
303  | |     PURPOSE: Initialize window enviroment
304  | | DESCRIPTION: initialize variables,
305  | |              prints introduction screen,
306  | |     RETURNS:
307  | |     HISTORY: 911124 V0.3
308  | ---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
309  | void initialize()
310  | {
311  |   extern char *default_subject;
312  | 
313  |   /*----------------------------------------------
314  |     Set vector to exit_prog() if exit() is called
315  |   ------------------------------------------------*/
316  |   atexit(exit_prog);
317  | 
318  |   /*----------------------------
319  |     Initilize (graphic) screen
320  |   ----------------------------*/
321  |   wn_init();
322  | 
323  | #if defined(USE_FORTIFY)
324  |   Fortify_ListAllMemory();
325  |   // Fortify_OutputStatistics();
326  | #endif
327  | 
328  |   /*-------------------------------
329  |     Initialize help file functions
330  |   ---------------------------------*/
331  |   default_subject = ":general_info";
332  |   init_help("window");
333  | 
334  | #if defined(USE_FORTIFY)
335  |   Fortify_ListAllMemory();
336  |   // Fortify_OutputStatistics();
337  | #endif
338  | 
339  |   /*-------------------
340  |     Show intro screen
341  |   --------------------*/
342  |   /*
343  |   intro_screen();
344  |   */
345  | 
346  |   /*-------------------------------------
347  |     Initialize function key's functions
348  |   --------------------------------------*/
349  |   /*
350  |   init_funkey(F2,call_zapload,"Zapload");
351  |   init_funkey(F3,call_hexconv,"HEXconv");
352  |   init_funkey(F4,call_terminal,"Terminal");
353  |   init_funkey(F10,OS_shell,"SHELL");
354  |   disp_funkeys(1);
355  |   */
356  | }
357  | 
358  | /*#+func--------------------------------------------------------------
359  |     FUNCTION: do_dir()
360  |      PURPOSE: Show directory
361  |  DESCRIPTION: Asks for a filemask and shows directory
362  |               If edit window was escaped with ESC, don't show the
363  |               directory
364  |      RETURNS: nothing
365  |      HISTORY: 911211 V0.1 - Initial version
366  | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------*/
367  | void do_dir(void)
368  | {
369  |   char filemask[20];
370  |   int ret;
371  | 
372  |   strcpy(filemask,"*.*");
373  |   ret = editstr(action_row+2,action_col+2,20,"Enter file mask",filemask,_DRAW);
374  |   if (ret != ESC)
375  |     get_dir(filemask,filemask);
376  | }
377  | 
378  | /*-------------------------------------------------------------------
379  | |    FUNCTION: main()
380  | |     PURPOSE: main programm
381  | | DESCRIPTION: -
382  | |     RETURNS: nothing
383  | |     HISTORY: 911124 V0.1 - Initial version
384  | ---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
385  | int main()
386  | {
387  |   int choise;
388  |   char s[80];
389  |   int i;
390  | 
391  |   initialize();
392  | 
393  | #if defined(USE_FORTIFY)
394  |   Fortify_ListAllMemory();
395  |   // Fortify_OutputStatistics();
396  | #endif
397  | 
398  |   do
399  |   {
400  |     choise = pulldown(heads,0,":general_info");
401  |   }
402  |   while (choise != ESC);
403  | 
404  |   /*--------------------
405  |     Exit this programm
406  |   ---------------------*/
407  | #if defined(USE_FORTIFY)
408  |   Fortify_ListAllMemory();
409  |   // Fortify_OutputStatistics();
410  | #endif
411  | 
412  |   exit(0);
413  |   return(0);
414  | }
